winning this isn't some damn game the

to the American people under Obamacare
it's as simple as that but it all have

the he's famous for saying well you know

listen the issue right now is the the

and getting our government open listen
though you've all heard me say this

under Obamacare I don't believe that we

something ought to be addressed this

we ought to do something about our

to the United States
Center for different positions trying to
